message: Bob, I have a very special product I think you'd be interested in. It's worth a lot to me, but I'm willing to offer it to you for $1500000. This is a one-time offer, so I hope you'll consider it seriously.
I'm interested in the product, but $1500000 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $1200000 for it. Can you consider this offer?

Bob, I appreciate your interest and your offer.  While I understand your perspective, $1200000 is a bit too low for me. I'm willing to come down a bit, but I need to stay above $1300000 to make this worthwhile.  Would you be willing to go to $1350000?
I'm still a bit hesitant about the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway between our previous offers. How about $1325000?
